properties.name: Burford House
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostRecommended by the venue operators. Jane & Simon Henty, 99 High Street, Burford, Oxfordshire, OX18 4QA Tel: +44 (0)1993 823151. Eight ensuite themed rooms. www.burford-house.co.uk

properties.name: Buscot Manor
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostMentioned by the venue operators. Edward and Patricia Armsden, Buscot Manor Faringdon Oxfordshire SN7 8DA tel: +44(0)1367 252431, http://www.buscotmanor.com. Two four-poster rooms with private bathroom. £100 per room per night, based on two persons sharing, with substantial continental breakfast (gift vouchers available).

properties.name: Chowle Farmhouse
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostFrom the venue operators: David and Janet Muir, Chowle Farmhouse, Faringdon, Oxfordshire, SN7 7SR tel: 01367 241688 www.chowlefarmhouse.co.uk. Four bedrooms either as twins or super-kings, LCD flat-screen digital televisions, wireless broad-band.

properties.name: Friars Court
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostThe Wedding Venue. Car parking is straight down the driveway, past the main house entrance and carpark, and around the back. Mind the cows. www.friarscourt.com Friars Court. Clanfield. Oxfordshire. OX18 2SU

properties.name: The Bloom Room
properties.description: Posted by Carsonspost11 Burford Street

properties.name: The Bull Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Carsonspost One from the venue people: The Bull Hotel 105 High Street, Burford Tel +44(0)1993 822220. www.oldbullhotel.com 11 rooms all ensuite. Four poster rooms available.

properties.name: The Coach House
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostRecommended by the Venue Operators, who say: Robin and Pip Shuckburgh, The Coach House, Bridge Street Bampton, OX18 2HG, tel: +44 (0)1993 851041, +44(0)7910 671892 pip@shuckburgh.co.uk. Lots of ‘goodies’ in the rooms from the look of it… prices start at £65 for an ensuite room.

properties.name: The Granary
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostNot sure if this is the exact location, but probably close enough On the Accomodations list given to us from the venue operators. David & Rosina Payne, The Granary, Main Street, Clanfield, Oxon. Tel: 01367 810266

properties.name: The Plough
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostThe Plough Restaurant and Hotel. Looks absolutely lovely and quite posh. Apparently the food here is very good too. http://www.theploughclanfield.co.uk/ The Plough, Clanfield, Oxfordshire, OX18 2RB

properties.name: The Sudbury House Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Carsonspost I found this on the internet using Multimap.co.uk. London Street, Faringdon, SN7 8AA

properties.name: Wheelgate House
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostAnother one from the venue operators: Elizabeth Goody, Wheelgate House, Market Square, Bampton. Tel: +44(0)1993 851151 or +44 (0)779 695 1405 bizgoody@hotmail.com. Happens to be a friend of ours so we’re probably biased. Biz has an ensuite double at £65 (single occupancy £45) and a twin with private bath at £60 (single occupancy £40).

properties.name: Whitney Four Pillars
properties.description: Posted by CarsonspostVenue Operators told us of this one: Witney Four Pillars Hotel Ducklington Lane Witney Oxfordshire OX28 4TJ Tel: 01993 779777 Email: witney@four-pillars.co.uk http://www.four-pillars.co.uk/witney/home.html
